body:
Hi


I just tried it with SketchUp Make 2016 on a Windows 10 system. I'm pretty
sure there isn't a general problem with Windows 7 or I'd have heard about
it by now.


Can you try to export again with the Ruby console window open, please?
There should be some information when the script starts and especially when
there is an error. Please copy the output and send it over.


Regards,
Thomas


On Tue, Apr 19, 2016 at 7:27 AM, Ma <marzena.husser at ilek.uni-stuttgart.de>
